verses.verse: Moreover thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> with ten <S%H6235><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%>; of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>, and blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, with cherubim the work <S%H4639><s%> of the skilful <S%H2803><s%> workman <S%H4639><s%> shalt thou make them <S%H6213><s%>.

The length <S%H753><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> shall be eight <S%H8083><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>: all the curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall have one <S%H259><s%> measure <S%H4060><s%>.

Five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall be coupled together <S%H2266><s%> one <S%H802><s%> to another <S%H269><s%>; and the other five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall be coupled <S%H2266><s%> one <S%H802><s%> to another <S%H269><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%> upon the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> from the selvedge <S%H7098><s%> in the coupling <S%H2279><s%>; and likewise shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> in the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> that is outmost <S%H7020><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> coupling <S%H4225><s%>.

Fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> in the one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%>, and fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> that is in the second <S%H8145><s%> coupling <S%H4225><s%>; the loops <S%H3924><s%> shall be opposite <S%H6901><s%> one <S%H802><s%> to another <S%H269><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> clasps <S%H7165><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and couple <S%H2266><s%> the curtains <S%H3407><s%> one to another with <S%H802><s%> the clasps <S%H7165><s%>: and the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> shall be one whole <S%H259><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> of goats <S%H5795><s%>' hair for a tent <S%H168><s%> over the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>: eleven <S%H6249><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shalt thou make them <S%H6213><s%>.

The length <S%H753><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> shall be thirty <S%H7970><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>: the eleven <S%H6249><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall have one <S%H259><s%> measure <S%H4060><s%>.

And thou shalt couple <S%H2266><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> by themselves <S%H8337><s%>, and six curtains <S%H3407><s%> by themselves <S%H3717><s%>, and shalt double over the sixth <S%H8345><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> in the forefront <S%H4136><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> that is outmost <S%H7020><s%> in the coupling <S%H2279><s%>, and fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> upon the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> which is outmost in the second <S%H8145><s%> coupling <S%H2279><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> clasps <S%H7165><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>, and put <S%H935><s%> the clasps <S%H7165><s%> into the loops <S%H3924><s%>, and couple <S%H2266><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> together <S%H259><s%>, that it may be one.

And the overhanging <S%H5629><s%> part that remaineth <S%H5736><s%> of the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%>, the half <S%H2677><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> that remaineth <S%H5736><s%>, shall hang <S%H5628><s%> over the back <S%H268><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And the cubit <S%H520><s%> on the one side <S%H2088><s%>, and the cubit <S%H520><s%> on the other side <S%H5736><s%>, of that which remaineth in the length <S%H753><s%> of the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%>, shall hang <S%H5628><s%> over the sides <S%H6654><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> on this side and on that side <S%H3680><s%>, to cover it.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> a covering <S%H4372><s%> for the tent <S%H168><s%> of rams <S%H352><s%>' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red <S%H119><s%>, and a covering <S%H4372><s%> of <S%H4605><s%> sealskins <S%H5785><s%> above <S%H4605><s%>.
And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> for the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, standing up <S%H5975><s%>.

Ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> of a board <S%H7175><s%>, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%>.

Two <S%H8147><s%> tenons <S%H3027><s%> shall there be in each <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%>, joined one <S%H259><s%> to <S%H7947><s%> another <S%H269><s%>: thus shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> for all the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> for the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> for the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward <S%H8486><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> under the twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under one <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> for its two <S%H8147><s%> tenons <S%H3027><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under another <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> for its two <S%H8147><s%> tenons <S%H3027><s%>:
and for the second <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, on the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%>,

and their forty <S%H705><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under one <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under another <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%>.
And for the hinder <S%H3411><s%> part of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%>.
And two <S%H8147><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> for the corners <S%H4742><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> in the hinder part <S%H3411><s%>.

And they shall be double <S%H8382><s%> beneath <S%H4295><s%>, and in like manner <S%H8382><s%> they <S%H3162><s%> shall be entire unto the top <S%H7218><s%> thereof unto one <S%H259><s%> ring <S%H2885><s%>: thus shall it be for them both <S%H8147><s%>; they shall be for the two <S%H8147><s%> corners <S%H4740><s%>.

And there shall be eight <S%H8083><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, sixteen <S%H8337><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under one <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under another <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>; five <S%H2568><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>,

and five <S%H2568><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and five <S%H2568><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, for the hinder part <S%H3411><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>.
And the middle <S%H8484><s%> bar <S%H1280><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the boards <S%H7175><s%> shall pass <S%H1272><s%> through from end <S%H7097><s%> to end <S%H7097><s%>.

And thou shalt overlay <S%H6823><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> their rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for places <S%H1004><s%> for the bars <S%H1280><s%>: and thou shalt overlay <S%H6823><s%> the bars <S%H1280><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%>.
And thou shalt rear up <S%H6965><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> according to the fashion <S%H4941><s%> thereof which hath been showed <S%H7200><s%> thee in the mount <S%H2022><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> a veil <S%H6532><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>: with cherubim <S%H3742><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of the skilful <S%H2803><s%> workman shall it be made <S%H6213><s%>:

and thou shalt hang <S%H5414><s%> it upon four <S%H702><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> overlaid <S%H6823><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%>; their hooks <S%H2053><s%> shall be of gold <S%H2091><s%>, upon four <S%H702><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>.

And thou shalt hang up <S%H5414><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> under the clasps <S%H7165><s%>, and shalt bring <S%H935><s%> in thither within <S%H1004><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>: and the veil <S%H6532><s%> shall separate <S%H914><s%> unto you between the holy <S%H6944><s%> place and the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>.
And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> the mercy-seat <S%H3727><s%> upon the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> in the most <S%H6944><s%> holy place <S%H6944><s%>.

And thou shalt set <S%H7760><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%>, and the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> over against <S%H5227><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> on the side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> toward the south <S%H8486><s%>: and thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6763><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> a screen <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%>, of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8438><s%>, and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of the embroiderer <S%H7551><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> for the screen <S%H4539><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%>, and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>; their hooks <S%H2053><s%> shall be of gold <S%H2091><s%>: and thou shalt cast <S%H3332><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of brass for them <S%H5178><s%>.
